item.title: Alternatives to Kubernetes
item.author: Patrick Deutsch
item.description: Alternatives to Kubernetes Serverless Suppose you are a developer working on a small application with a simple backend handling a limited number of API endpoints. In such cases, you can use serverless architectures, like AWS Lambda and API Gateway, to create a scalable and cost-effective backend that serves requests on demand. Let’s briefly explore some serverless resources: AWS Lambda: A serverless compute service that allows you to run code without provisioning or managing servers.
